11#include "video/adaptation/pixel_limit_resource.h"
12
13#include "api/sequence_checker.h"
14#include "api/units/time_delta.h"
15#include "call/adaptation/video_stream_adapter.h"
16#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
17#include "rtc_base/ref_counted_object.h"
18
19namespace webrtc {
20
21namespace {
22
23constexpr TimeDelta kResourceUsageCheckIntervalMs = TimeDelta::Seconds(5);
24
25} // namespace
26
27// static
28rtc::scoped_refptr<PixelLimitResource> PixelLimitResource::Create(
29 TaskQueueBase* task_queue,
30 VideoStreamInputStateProvider* input_state_provider) {
31 return rtc::make_ref_counted<PixelLimitResource>(task_queue,
32 input_state_provider);
33}
34
35PixelLimitResource::PixelLimitResource(
36 TaskQueueBase* task_queue,
37 VideoStreamInputStateProvider* input_state_provider)
38 : task_queue_(task_queue),
39 input_state_provider_(input_state_provider),
40 max_pixels_(absl::nullopt) {
41 RTC_DCHECK(task_queue_);
42 RTC_DCHECK(input_state_provider_);
43}
44
45PixelLimitResource::~PixelLimitResource() {
46 RTC_DCHECK(!listener_);
47 RTC_DCHECK(!repeating_task_.Running());
48}
49
50void PixelLimitResource::SetMaxPixels(int max_pixels) {
51 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(task_queue_);
52 max_pixels_ = max_pixels;
53}
54
55void PixelLimitResource::SetResourceListener(ResourceListener* listener) {
56 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(task_queue_);
57 listener_ = listener;
58 if (listener_) {
59 repeating_task_.Stop();
60 repeating_task_ = RepeatingTaskHandle::Start(task_queue_, [&] {
61 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(task_queue_);
62 if (!listener_) {
63 // We don't have a listener so resource adaptation must not be running,
64 // try again later.
65 return kResourceUsageCheckIntervalMs;
66 }
67 if (!max_pixels_.has_value()) {
68 // No pixel limit configured yet, try again later.
69 return kResourceUsageCheckIntervalMs;
70 }
71 absl::optional<int> frame_size_pixels =
72 input_state_provider_->InputState().frame_size_pixels();
73 if (!frame_size_pixels.has_value()) {
74 // We haven't observed a frame yet so we don't know if it's going to be
75 // too big or too small, try again later.
76 return kResourceUsageCheckIntervalMs;
77 }
78 int current_pixels = frame_size_pixels.value();
79 int target_pixel_upper_bounds = max_pixels_.value();
80 // To avoid toggling, we allow any resolutions between
81 // |target_pixel_upper_bounds| and video_stream_adapter.h's
82 // GetLowerResolutionThan(). This is the pixels we end up if we adapt down
83 // from |target_pixel_upper_bounds|.
84 int target_pixels_lower_bounds =
85 GetLowerResolutionThan(target_pixel_upper_bounds);
86 if (current_pixels > target_pixel_upper_bounds) {
87 listener_->OnResourceUsageStateMeasured(this,
88 ResourceUsageState::kOveruse);
89 } else if (current_pixels < target_pixels_lower_bounds) {
90 listener_->OnResourceUsageStateMeasured(this,
91 ResourceUsageState::kUnderuse);
92 }
93 return kResourceUsageCheckIntervalMs;
94 });
95 } else {
96 repeating_task_.Stop();
97 }
98 // The task must be running if we have a listener.
99 RTC_DCHECK(repeating_task_.Running() || !listener_);
100}
101
102} // namespace webrtc
103
